A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No\, no\, no! I thought Mark Hamill was excellent back as Luke. He is a broken Luke in this\, but I enjoyed every scene he was in. Wish there was more of him and less of everything else. I actually think Kilo Ren was great as well. He is what he is\, and I feel like the Kilo in TFA is the same in this (like him or hate him). While he is no Vadar villain\, he isn’t supposed to be\, he wants to be Vadar so bad but just can’t live up to the legend. It makes him a flawed but real villain. Rey was good in this too. I was surprised that I liked her as she was just alright in TFA. Much better in this movie. Now for the bad: Poe was annoying with lame jokes\, the Fin/Rose story line was not necessary\, a flying Princess\, the whole casino and horse creature scenes of cheese\, Rey getting on the Falcon at the end mysteriously\, no Luke vs. Kilo epic battle (despite the excellent build-up)\, and worst of all Luke’s last scene (of which I still can’t wrap my head around). What could have been...
